description: CityModel is the container for all objects belonging to a city model.

properties.name: cityObjectMember
properties.description: Specifies the city objects that are part of the CityModel.

properties.name: versionMember
properties.description: Specifies the different versions of the CityModel.

properties.name: versionTransitionMember
properties.description: Specifies the transitions between the different versions of the CityModel.

properties.name: appearanceMember
properties.description: Specifies the appearances of the CityModel.

properties.name: featureMember
properties.description: Specifies the feature objects that are part of the CityModel. It allows to include features that are not derived from core:AbstractCityObject.
